review: The fire stick has met all of my expectations and we love it
author: laurie Alton

review: So far so good- love Pandora, fitness programs and movies that I wanted to see but never got to
author: Marmie

review: So great! Price is great too!
author: Elizabeth Soto

review: The Fire Stick would probably get more stars if the battery cover for the remote wasn't nearly impossible to open; poor design and flimsy materials, make you feel like your going to break the remote or your fingers trying to open it. Now the batteries are in and I hope I don't have to change them too often. (it seems to be a little easier to open now since the first time). Plugged stick into my TV and after connecting to WiFi  it recognized my Amazon Account and I didn't have to log in, it just worked.  Everything works just like it's supposed to.
author: Alyssa

review: A little stick that can do a whole lot.
author: Bill Walden

review: Super easy to use and install, ordered Netflix with it as well.  This is exactly what I was looking for!
author: Brooke Dando

review: Easier than a smart tv remote!Be sure to set up 'one click' for everything on your amazon account to access 'pay for' and 'free' applications.
author: Dawn Clarke
